title: ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is chosen
description: The ControlExampleText component produces a beeping sound when SWT.MULTI option is selected. This behavior seems unintended.
OB: When clicking on other buttons, the beeping sound persists.
EB: The ControlExampleText component should not produce a beeping sound when SWT.MULTI option is selected.
